Package edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces

Interface GroundInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bushes, Crater, Dirt, Floor, Floor, Floor, Ground, LockedDoor, Tree, Tree, VendingMachine, Wall, Wall
public interface GroundInterface
This interface provides the ability to add methods to Ground, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default java.util.ArrayList<Fruit> getFruits()
    gets the list of fruits that are in the bush
    default Fruit removeFruit()
    removes a fruit from the bush once it may be plucked or eaten from the bush

  • Method Details

    • getFruits

      default java.util.ArrayList<Fruit> getFruits()
      gets the list of fruits that are in the bush
      Returns:
      the array list of all the fruits on this bush

    • removeFruit

      default Fruit removeFruit()
      removes a fruit from the bush once it may be plucked or eaten from the bush
      Returns:
      the fruit that was removed from the list of fruits on the bush
